thread.title: Ram Charan to study script writing
thread.title_full: Ram Charan to study script writing - The Times of India

author: timesofindia.indiatimes.com
title: Ram Charan to study script writing
text:
Post the release of Bruce Lee, Mega Power Star Ram Charan is enjoying a much needed break and he also plans to go on a long vacation abroad. And the latest we hear is that Charan is planning to pursue a course in script writing in November and December. Charan revealed that this course will help him while judging the scripts which writers and directors pitch to him. Charan further said that audiences have changed and that they reject films that show fake emotions and films with weak stories. Charan also stated that he will give priority to content-driven films while choosing stories for all his upcoming films.
